WHY BITCOIN MATTERS FOR HUMAN RIGHTS
This 2 minute video by Alex Gladstein details on why Bitcoin matters for human rights. Bitcoin is changing the world for the better:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KG0Q05Lnm7s

Thread by Alex Gladstein detailing on one local woman's take on the Bitcoin initiative put for forth by Bukele:
https://twitter.com/gladstein/status/1403479559555543040?s=20

Bitcoin is protecting human rights around the world [5.5 min]
https://youtu.be/xLYYh4aPXAM

For those who want to donate to a Bitcoin related charity - the Human Rights Foundation's Bitcoin Development Fund - In 2020, the Human Rights Foundation launched a fund to support software developers who are making the Bitcoin network more private, decentralized, and resilient so that it can better serve as a financial tool for human rights activists, civil society organizations, and journalists around the world.https://hrf.org/devfund
